item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I didn't get a consistent number across all scripts - for 5 data loading scripts I have, 4 of them gain >50% performance as mentioned above, but the the last one is almost identical. There is no significant different in all these scripts, I mean in logic, though the special one is handling large amount of data compare with others, but data is just a pipe flow through the processing codes, I'm not storing them at all ...
I will leave things running some more days and see if it is just a abnormal case.
item.content:encoded:
I didn’t get a consistent number across all scripts – for 5 data loading scripts I have, 4 of them gain >50% performance as mentioned above, but the the last one is almost identical. There is no significant different in all these scripts, I mean in logic, though the special one is handling large amount of data compare with others, but data is just a pipe flow through the processing codes, I’m not storing them at all …

I will leave things running some more days and see if it is just a abnormal case.
